required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Water Drinking Test Response in Supine and Sitting Position Using the Continuous Measurement Device Sensimed Triggerfish Intraocular Pressure in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Water Drinking Test Response in Supine and Sitting Position Using the Continuous Intraocular Pressure Measurement Device Sensimed Triggerfish in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Monocentric, prospective study, comparison of the water drinking test response in the supine and in the sitting position using the intraocular pressure monitoring device Sensimed Triggerfish in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Measure of intraocular pressure while lying down
primary_outcome.description: Peak IOP defined by the maximum level reached Peak period defined by the time from the ingestion of water and the occurrence of the IOP; and Time to get back to the initial pressure, as measured with the sensimed triggerfish device. On one eye and the lens is inserted on the other eye.

primary_outcome.measure: Measure of intraocular pressure while sitting
primary_outcome.description: Peak IOP defined by the maximum level reached; Peak period defined by the time from the ingestion of water and the occurrence of the IOP; and Time to get back to the initial pressure, as measured with the sensimed triggerfish device. On one eye and the lens is inserted on the other eye.

primary_outcome.measure: Measure of intraocular pressure on the eye without the lens.
primary_outcome.description: Peak IOP defined by the maximum level reached; Peak period defined by the time from the ingestion of water and the occurrence of the IOP; and Time to get back to the initial pressure, as measured with the non-contact tonometer.

primary_outcome.measure: Mesure of intraocular pressure on the eye
primary_outcome.description: Six results. Without the lens each 15 minutes. After drinking 1 L of water.

primary_outcome.measure: Mesure of intraocular pressure on the eye without the lens each 30 minutes.
primary_outcome.description: Two results. After drinking 1 L of water.

intervention.intervention_name: Intraocular pressure measurement with the Sensimed triggerfish Device

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy subjects
- Aged over 18 years
- No previous ophthalmic conditions
- Spherical equivalent from - 6 to +3 diopters
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contact lens use

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Ophthalmology CHU de Grenoble/University Hospital of Grenoble
